ComicInfo.Summary: Nova and the Vision try to deduce which of the Avengers is an impostor by digging through their rooms at Avengers Mansion. Meanwhile, Iron Man, Invisible Woman, and Captain America drive away giant monsters that are menacing Atlantis, and find the Black Widow unconscious.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 09:59:18. [Issue ID 792239]
ComicInfo.Characters: Nova,Black Widow,Sub-Mariner [Prince Namor],Avengers [Iron Man,Invisible Woman,Captain America,Thor (cameo flashback)],Vision,Mr. Fantastic (cameo),Odin (cameo flashback),Carolina Pissaro
